name: LastflightoftheIcarus
0: ”Alexa, open last flight of the icarus”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: last flight of the icarus
Developer Terms of Use
des:
An abandoned ship. A missing crew. A ticking clock.
Step into this fully immersive, real-time adventure set aboard the deep space research vessel the ICARUS. Can you uncover the mysteries of the dying ship and escape before time runs out? 

Featuring:
Multiple endings based on player actions
Interactive action sequences
Innovative puzzle games
Real-time ‘ticking clock’ sections
Immersive music and sound effects
A brand new story and setting

Good luck, and remember – seeing is believing…


Reference:
Basic EVE Suit(Alexa) Commands:
Use
Describe
Move
List Commands

Your progress will only save once you reach a safe room.

If you enjoy this adventure please leave us a review and share with your friends. We greatly appreciate the continued support from the community.
If you have any comments, requests or suggestions on how we can improve the experience further please get in touch directly at lastflightoftheicarus@gmail.com

Sounds are from zapsplat.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
